items.title: Classifier
items.description: A classification task to apply to input or responses.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: This classifier is only applied when this condition resolves truthily (blank is true). Classifiers are somewhat time-intensive, so avoiding an unnecessary classifier is a good idea.

dependencies.title: Dependencies
dependencies.description: A comma-delimited list of classifier or generator names that must run before this classifier can trigger.

inputTemplate.title: Input Template
inputTemplate.description: An optional input template; if set, this classification task will be performed upon inputs.

inputHypothesis.title: Input Hypothesis Template
inputHypothesis.description: This is the hypothesis template applied to classifications performed on inputs.

responseTemplate.title: Response Template
responseTemplate.description: An optional response template; if set, this classification task will be performed upon responses.

responseHypothesis.title: Response Hypothesis Template
responseHypothesis.description: This is the hypothesis template applied to classifications performed on responses.

useLlm.title: Use LLM
useLlm.description: If true, the user's LLM will be used for classification. This can yield more accurate results for complex classification tasks, but also tends to take longer.

useHistory.title: Use Chat History
useHistory.description: If using the LLM, this will determine whether the chat history is also sent to the model to provide additional context to the classification task. This will increase the request's token count and runtime.

classifications.title: Classifications
classifications.description: An array of classifications to test for.

label.title: Label
label.description: The label substituted into the hypothesis.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: This classification is only included in the task when this condition resolves truthily (blank is true). This allows the label count to be reduced for faster task times.

category.title: Category
category.description: If multiple labels share a category, only the highest entailment applies.

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: The minimum entailment score to apply this classification.

dynamic.title: Dynamic
dynamic.description: If true, label is evaluated to a string or array of strings, potentially resulting in multiple labels.

updates.title: Updates
updates.description: An array of variable updates to make when this classification is applied.

items.title: Update
items.description: An update to make to a variable when this classification is applied.

variable.title: Variable
variable.description: Name of the variable to update.

setTo.title: Set To
setTo.description: Value to update this variable to when this classification is applied.
